sectionHeading: Overnight Closures Scheduled for I-75N and I-64E

location: I-75N between northern 75/64 split and 120 MM / Scott Co line
impact: Two left lanes blocked for joint patching operations.

location: Exit 75 from I-64E to I-75N will be closed.
impact: Take I-75S to Exit 115 to access I-75N.

location: S Upper St between W Main St and W Vine St
impact: Street CLOSED for major utility installation.

location: Clay Ave between Central Ave and E High St
impact: Alternating lane closures for water line repair.

impact: Southbound lane blocked for storm system work.

location: N Limestone between Tenth St and N Broadway Park
impact: Inbound lane blocked for pole installation.

location: Redding Rd between Hightower Rd and Lansdowne Dr
impact: Alternating lane closures for gas line repair.

location: Star Shoot Pkwy between Pink Pigeon Pkwy and Ogden Way
impact: Alternating lane closures for catch basin repair.

location: W Short St between N Upper St and N Limestone
